data.description: Covers PLN’s grid feasibility study, connection agreement process, and early-stage system protection review. Must precede construction and power injection.

notes.informal_notes: Delays are common due to undisclosed internal queues. Developer follow-up and PLN relationship management often necessary.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: Grid approval serves as technical validation that a project is feasible — often a turning point for moving into final design and construction finance.
notes.feedback_structure: PLN sometimes gives informal feedback or asks for design changes before issuing a formal rejection. No structured public appeal process.
failure_modes: Repeated redesign requests from PLN without clarity
Uncertainty over storage project categorization for injection rights
